description: 1. The current notice is issued pursuant to Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) Supply Memorandum of Understanding (MOU)  # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement for the following product categories:- Product Category 1 - Interconnecting Products and Freestanding Systems;- Product Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products;- Product Category 3 - Metal Filing And Storage Cabinets;- Product Category 5 - Ancillary And Lighting Products- The requirement also contains products that are NOT COVERED BY THE SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT.",
